frontmatter.title: IBM Event Streams customer experience
frontmatter.description: Work on the pre-purchase experience of Event Streams.

internal.content:
---
title: IBM Event Streams customer experience
description: Work on the pre-purchase experience of Event Streams. 
---

## Summary

In improving the customer experience of Event Streams, I worked closely with Marketing, Technical Sales, Offering Management and Design Research.
We worked in particularly short time constraints, and with restriction from a tight Drupal template, which was challenging.

title: IBM Event Streams customer experience

## Summary

In improving the customer experience of Event Streams, I worked closely with Marketing, Technical Sales, Offering Management and Design Research.
We worked in particularly short time constraints, and with restriction from a tight Drupal template, which was challenging.
